name: nim
description: nertc Web SDK 网易云信|新一代音视频引擎服务

scripts.build:tester:g2: npm run build:plugins && cross-env PLATFORM=g2 node build/tester.js
scripts.zip:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:api && node build/api/zip.js
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env PLATFORM=all NODE_ENV=production npm run dev
scripts.dev:g2: cross-env PLATFORM=g2 NO_SOURCE_MAP=true NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js -w
scripts.pack:g2: npm run clean && npm run build:sdk:g2 && npm run build:tester:g2 && npm run deploy:g2 && npm run build:api
scripts.pack:test:g2: cross-env PLATFORM=all NODE_ENV=test npm run pack:g2
scripts.jenkins:g2: npm run clean && cross-env PLATFORM=g2 NODE_ENV=development npm run build:sdk:g2 && npm run build:api
scripts.pack:pre: cross-env PLATFORM=all NODE_ENV=pre npm run pack
scripts.pack:prod:plugin:g2: cross-env PLATFORM=all NODE_ENV=production npm run pack:g2 && npm run zip:sdk:advBeauty:g2
scripts.pack:prod:g2: cross-env PLATFORM=all NODE_ENV=production npm run pack:g2 && npm run zip:sdk:g2
scripts.pack:custom: cross-env PLATFORM=all NODE_ENV=custom npm run pack
scripts.pack:head:g2: npm run clean && PLATFORM=g2 NODE_ENV=test npm run build:sdk:g2 && PLATFORM=g2 NODE_ENV=test npm run build:tester:g2 && npm run build:api && PLATFORM=g2 NODE_ENV=test TARGET_DIR=/var/nertc-builds/by-build node build/deployByHEAD.js
scripts.pack:commit:g2: npm run clean && npm run build:sdk:g2 && npm run build:tester:g2 && npm run build:api && TARGET_DIR=/var/nertc-builds/env/${NODE_ENV}/by-build node build/deployByHEAD.js
scripts.npm:production:deploy: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:sdk:g2 && zx build/npm/deploy-to-npm-repo.mjs
scripts.npm:test:deploy: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=test npm run build:sdk:g2 && zx build/npm/deploy-test-to-npm-repo.mjs
scripts.proto: npx pbjs -t json-module -w commonjs -o src/netcall-G2/util/proto/proto.js  src/netcall-G2/util/proto/*.proto && npx pbts -o src/netcall-G2/util/proto/proto.d.ts src/netcall-G2/util/proto/proto.js

author: netease im
